title: Welcome back!
description: We are so happy to announce our newly elected executive board and our shiny new website! Please check the Events tab for all that is coming!

title: 5 à 7 W(h)ine & Whimpers
description: We are about to kick off into 2021 with a socializing/kvetching session for voice teachers. We want to provide a space for voice professionals to come together and chat! (More info here)

title: Trans Voice Workshop
description: We are planning to reboot of our previously cancelled workshop on trans voice. Currently, we are envisioning a 2-part series. The first short workshop would be ‘trans 101 for the voice studio’, and the second workshop would address specific questions from our members arising from the first workshop. (More info here)
